trans-unit.source: Provides an editor control that enables end users to edit several layout-oriented user interface (UI) properties on an associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um controle de editor que permite aos usuários finais editar várias propriedades de interface do usuário de usuário orientada a layout em um associado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The LayoutEditorPart class is an editor control that derives from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class, and is used to edit properties that affect the layout of an associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: A classe LayoutEditorPart é um controle de editor que deriva de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>classe e é usado para editar as propriedades que afetam o layout de um associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: Just as there are tool-oriented zones in the Web Parts control set (for details, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone> class overview), there are tool-oriented part controls (tool parts), and each tool part must reside in a certain type of tool zone.
trans-unit.target: Apenas há orientada a ferramenta zonas no conjunto de controle de Web Parts (para obter detalhes, consulte o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone>Visão geral da classe), existem controles orientada a ferramenta parte (partes de ferramenta), e cada parte da ferramenta deve residir em um determinado tipo de zona de ferramenta.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone>

trans-unit.source: Tool parts in the Web Parts control set have two distinguishing characteristics: - They are helper controls that enable end users to personalize controls on a Web Parts page.
trans-unit.target: Partes de ferramenta no conjunto de controle de Web Parts têm características de distinção dois:-são controles de auxiliar que permitem aos usuários finais personalizem controles em uma página de Web Parts.

trans-unit.source: - They are visible only in certain display modes.
trans-unit.target: -Elas são visíveis apenas em certos modos de exibição.

trans-unit.source: The LayoutEditorPart control is a tool part that becomes visible only when a Web Parts page is in edit mode, and when a specific <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control has been selected for editing.
trans-unit.target: O controle LayoutEditorPart é uma parte de ferramenta fica visível apenas quando uma página de Web Parts está em modo de edição e quando um determinado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controle foi selecionado para edição.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The LayoutEditorPart control, like all other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls, resides in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> control.
trans-unit.target: O controle de LayoutEditorPart, como todos os outros <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controla, reside em um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > An <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> zone can contain only <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls cannot be placed in any other type of zone.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>zona só pode conter <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controles, e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controles não podem ser colocados em qualquer outro tipo de zona.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>

trans-unit.source: The LayoutEditorPart class has a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.Title%2A> property, which gets or sets the title for a layout control.
trans-unit.target: A classe LayoutEditorPart tem um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.Title%2A>propriedade, que obtém ou define o título de um controle de layout.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.Title%2A>

trans-unit.source: The class also has a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.Display%2A> property, which overrides the base property and returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: A classe também tem um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.Display%2A>propriedade, que substitui a propriedade base e retorna `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.Display%2A>

trans-unit.source: This means that the LayoutEditorPart control is always visible when the page is in edit mode, even if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A> property on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control being edited is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Isso significa que o controle LayoutEditorPart está sempre visível quando a página estiver no modo de edição, mesmo se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controle que está sendo editado é definida como `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: In other words, users can always edit the properties in a LayoutEditorPart control, even if a specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control cannot be edited by the other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: Em outras palavras, os usuários sempre podem editar as propriedades em um controle LayoutEditorPart, mesmo se um especificado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controle não pode ser editado por outros <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controles.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The LayoutEditorPart class also has two important methods, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>, which it inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class and overrides.
trans-unit.target: A classe LayoutEditorPart também tem dois métodos importantes, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>, que ele herda o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>classe e substituições.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.SyncChanges%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: The methods are critical because they enable getting and setting the property values between the field values of the editor control and the properties on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control being edited.
trans-unit.target: Os métodos são essenciais porque elas permitem obter e definir os valores de propriedade entre os valores de campo de controle de editor e as propriedades no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlar o que está sendo editado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: In most cases, the LayoutEditorPart control should be used in page persistence format by declaring an `<asp:layouteditorpart>` element inside a `<zonetemplate>` element, which is in turn contained by an `<asp:editorzone>` element on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: Na maioria dos casos, o controle LayoutEditorPart deve ser usado em formato de persistência da página, declarando um `<asp:layouteditorpart>` elemento dentro de um `<zonetemplate>` elemento, que por sua vez, está contido por um `<asp:editorzone>` elemento em uma página da Web.

trans-unit.source: The LayoutEditorPart control enables end users to edit the following UI properties of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeState%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Zone%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ZoneIndex%2A> To edit other properties and behavior of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, you can use the other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls supplied with the Web Parts control set.
trans-unit.target: O controle de LayoutEditorPart permite que os usuários finais editar as seguintes propriedades de interface do usuário de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controle:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeState%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Zone%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ZoneIndex%2A>Editar outras propriedades e o comportamento de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controles, você pode usar outros <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controles fornecidos com o conjunto de controles de Web Parts.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ZoneIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Zone%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: These controls include the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Esses controles incluem o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>e o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The supplied <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls should provide most editing features required to edit <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, but you can also create a custom editor control by inheriting from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class.
trans-unit.target: Fornecido <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controles devem fornecer a maioria dos recursos de edição necessárias para editar <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>os controles, mas você também pode criar um controle editor personalizado por herança da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>classe</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> de</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo de código, consulte o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>Visão geral da classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To improve accessibility, the LayoutEditorPart control is rendered within a `<fieldset>` element.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Para melhorar o acesso, o controle LayoutEditorPart é renderizado dentro de um `<fieldset>` elemento.

trans-unit.source: The `<fieldset>` element groups the related set of controls used for editing in the LayoutEditorPart control, and it facilitates tabbed navigation among those controls for both visual user agents (such as ordinary Web browsers) and speech-oriented user agents (such as screen-reading software).
trans-unit.target: O `<fieldset>` elemento agrupa um conjunto relacionado de controles usados para edição no controle LayoutEditorPart e facilita a navegação com guias entre esses controles para os agentes do usuário visual (como navegadores comuns) e os agentes de usuário orientada a fala (como o software de leitura de tela).

trans-unit.source: Accessibility The markup rendered by default for this control might not conform to accessibility standards such as the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 1.0 (WCAG) priority 1 guidelines.
trans-unit.target: Acessibilidade a marcação processada por padrão para este controle pode não estar de acordo com os padrões de acessibilidade, como as diretrizes de prioridade 1 conteúdo WCAG Web Accessibility Guidelines 1.0 ().

trans-unit.source: For details about accessibility support for this control, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter detalhes sobre o suporte de acessibilidade para este controle, consulte [controles ASP.NET e acessibilidade](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the class.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância da classe.

trans-unit.source: The LayoutEditorPart constructor is a default; no constructor is declared in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> class and hence no special tasks are carried out when a new instance of the class is created.
trans-unit.target: O construtor LayoutEditorPart é um padrão. Nenhum construtor está declarado no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>classe e tarefas especiais, portanto, não são executadas quando uma nova instância da classe é criada.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: Normally you do not need to use the constructor, because you can add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control to a page declaratively at design time.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente você não precisa usar o construtor, porque você pode adicionar um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>controle a uma página de forma declarativa em tempo de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: However, if you need to add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control programmatically for some reason, you can use the LayoutEditorPart constructor.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, se você precisar adicionar um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>controle programaticamente por algum motivo, você pode usar o construtor LayoutEditorPart.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: Saves the values from a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart"></xref> control to the corresponding properties in the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Salva os valores de uma <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart"> </xref> controle para as propriedades correspondentes na associado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The ApplyChanges method is a critical method on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: O método ApplyChanges é um método crítico em um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The method's purpose is to save the values a user has set on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control to the corresponding properties in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Finalidade do método é salvar os valores que um usuário tiver definido em um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>controle para as propriedades correspondentes na associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The associated control is referenced in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control's inherited <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O controle associado é referenciado no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>herdado do controle do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > You cannot call the ApplyChanges method from your own code.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Não é possível chamar o método ApplyChanges de seu próprio código.

trans-unit.source: However, if you need more programmatic control over the process of editing various <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control properties than the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control provides, you can create a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control and provide your own implementation of this method.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, se você precisar de mais controle programático sobre o processo de edição de várias <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlar propriedades do que o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>fornece controle, você pode criar um personalizado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controlar e fornecer sua própria implementação deste método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: For an example, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo, consulte o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The ApplyChanges method attempts to set the following properties on the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ChromeState%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Zone%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ZoneIndex%2A> The ApplyChanges method is called when the user clicks a button representing an OK or an apply verb in the editing user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: O método ApplyChanges tenta definir as propriedades a seguir em associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controle:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ChromeState%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Zone%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ZoneIndex%2A>ApplyChanges o método é chamado quando o usuário clica em um botão que representa um verbo de aplicar na interface do usuário edição (UI) ou um Okey.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ZoneIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Zone%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ChromeState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the action of saving values from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart"></xref> control to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control is successful; otherwise (if an error occurs), <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a ação de salvar os valores do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart"> </xref> o controle para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controle for bem-sucedida; caso contrário (se ocorrer um erro), <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when setting the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ChromeState*> property on the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Ocorreu um erro ao definir o valor da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ChromeState*>propriedade associado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ChromeState*>

trans-unit.source: Overrides the base property inherited from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel"></xref> control to hide the property from designers and prevent it from being affected by themes.
trans-unit.target: Substitui a propriedade base herdada da <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel"> </xref> controle para ocultar a propriedade de designers e impedir que sejam afetados por temas.

trans-unit.source: Though it is public, this property is used for default rendering of this control and is not intended to be called from developer code.
trans-unit.target: Embora seja público, essa propriedade é usada para a renderização padrão deste controle e não se destina a ser chamado no código do desenvolvedor.

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não pode ser definida por temas ou temas de folha de estilo.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>e [capas e temas do ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the ID of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"></xref> control that receives the default focus in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém a ID do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"> </xref> controle que recebe o foco padrão em um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a control should be displayed when its associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se um controle deve ser exibido quando seus associados <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controle está no modo de edição.

trans-unit.source: The Display property returns `true` even if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A> property is `false` on the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de exibição retorna `true` mesmo se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A>é de propriedade `false` em associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is so that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control can always be available in edit mode, even when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control cannot be edited by the other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: Isso é para que o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>controle sempre pode estar disponível no modo de edição, mesmo quando um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controle não pode ser editado por outros <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controles.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether the control should be displayed.
trans-unit.target: Um valor booliano que indica se o controle deve ser exibido.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the property values from a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control and assigns them to the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Recupera os valores de propriedade de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> de controle e os atribui associados <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The SyncChanges method is a critical method on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: O método SyncChanges é um método crítico em um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: It implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A> method from the base class, retrieves the current values from the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, and updates the child controls in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control with those values so a user can edit them.
trans-unit.target: Ele implementa o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>método da classe base, recupera os valores atuais de associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controle e atualizações de controles filho no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>controle com esses valores para um usuário pode editá-los.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SyncChanges method is called whenever the values in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control might have changed.
trans-unit.target: O método SyncChanges é chamado sempre que os valores associados <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controle pode ter alterado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: For a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> zone that contains the control calls the SyncChanges method immediately after calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> method, so that the values in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control are always synchronized with the values in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Para um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>controle, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase>zona que contém o controle chama o método SyncChanges imediatamente depois de chamar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A>método, para que os valores a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>controle sempre são sincronizados com os valores associados <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: Another case where the SyncChanges method is called is when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control is initially entering edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Outro caso em que o método SyncChanges é chamado é quando um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controle é inicialmente no modo de edição.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a title for the editor control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um título para o controle de editor.

trans-unit.source: The Title property value is displayed in the title bar of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control when the control is visible in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade Title é exibido na barra de título de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>controlar quando o controle está visível no modo de edição.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: When the control is declared in a page, you can set a value for the `Title` attribute.
trans-unit.target: Quando o controle for declarado em uma página, você pode definir um valor para o `Title` atributo.

trans-unit.source: If you do not supply a value for the title, a culture-specific default value is used to describe the properties that this control allows users to edit.
trans-unit.target: Se você não fornecer um valor para o título, um valor específico da cultura padrão é usado para descrever as propriedades que esse controle permite que os usuários editem.

trans-unit.source: A string that is used as the title of the control.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que é usada como o título do controle.

trans-unit.source: The default value is a calculated control name supplied by the Web Parts control set.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é um nome de controle calculado fornecidas pelo conjunto de controle de Web Parts.
